About

Havas Sports & Entertainment is the global brand engagement network of HAVAS.
Our 35 offices in 20 markets include Havas Sports & Entertainment and ignition
agencies, and our strategic partners Seven46, Benza and Music Dealers. We
deliver strategically sound creative solutions based on insight, experience
and a deep understanding of what binds people together into communities:
shared passions. Our mission is to create meaningful relationships between
brands and fans through their passions using creativity, media and technology.
Whether it be sponsorship, content creation, partnerships, celebrity
endorsement, social media, PR or live brand experiences, we recommend in
